title: Drawing, Design for the Title Page of The Scarlet Thorn, by John Burroughs, published in St. Nicolas, July 1892, 1892
title_raw: Design for the Title Page of The Scarlet Thorn, by John Burroughs, published in St. Nicolas, July 1892
medium: Pen and black ink, brush and gray wash, graphite on off-white bristol board
markings: Stamp in purple ink across lower left corner: ANTE
signed: At center left in pen and black ink: Monogram and date'92
inscribed:
Lower right in graphite: These are three of the most likely thorns that Mr. Burroughs mentions in his papers.
Verso in graphite: "not used"; "1892"
description: Above the title, author and Initial letter (I) there is an arrangement of leaves, blossoms, berries and thorn branches labeled "Washington Thorn" (lower left); "White Thorn" (upper left); "Apple haw" (upper right)

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, Design for the Title Page of The Scarlet Thorn, by John Burroughs, published in St. Nicolas, July 1892, 1892. Pen and black ink, brush and gray wash, graphite on off-white bristol board. 
1950-56-1
